episode.title: Distortion Check: v3 Alpha Test Content
episode.description: Test content specifically designed for ElevenLabs v3 Alpha with Audio Tags

content.speaker: Victor
content.text: [excited] Welcome to our v3 Alpha test! [pauses] This is Victor, and I'm genuinely thrilled to demonstrate the new Audio Tags feature.
content.nextText: Now Lenny will show you some emotional range with the new system.

content.speaker: Lenny
content.text: [nervous] Oh wow, this is... [gulps] this is actually pretty intense. [whispers] Can you hear how my voice just changed completely?
content.previousText: Welcome to our v3 Alpha test! This is Victor, and I'm genuinely thrilled to demonstrate the new Audio Tags feature.
content.nextText: Victor will demonstrate some dramatic range next.

content.speaker: Victor
content.text: [dramatic] The old world is ending! [sighs] But from its ashes... [hopeful] something beautiful will emerge.
content.previousText: Oh wow, this is actually pretty intense. Can you hear how my voice just changed completely?
content.nextText: Lenny will show you how laughter sounds with the new system.

direction.emphasis: strong contrast between ending and beginning

content.speaker: Lenny
content.text: [laughs] This is absolutely incredible! [starts laughing harder] I can't believe how natural this sounds! [giggles] It's like we're really here talking.
content.previousText: The old world is ending! But from its ashes something beautiful will emerge.
content.nextText: Victor will test some technical pronunciation next.

content.speaker: Victor
content.text: [matter-of-fact] Now let's test pronunciation. The word 'laboratory' should sound like 'LAB-or-ah-tree'. [curious] Did that work correctly?
content.previousText: This is absolutely incredible! I can't believe how natural this sounds! It's like we're really here talking.
content.nextText: Lenny will demonstrate sarcasm and deadpan delivery.

content.speaker: Lenny
content.text: [sarcastic] Oh sure, because AI voices are totally going to replace human actors. [deadpan] That'll never happen. [chuckles] Right?
content.previousText: Now let's test pronunciation. The word 'laboratory' should sound like 'LAB-or-ah-tree'. Did that work correctly?
content.nextText: Victor will conclude with a whispered secret.

direction.pace: varying from sarcastic to flat to light

content.speaker: Victor
content.text: [whispers] Here's a secret about v3 Alpha... [even quieter] it can actually understand context between sentences. [normal voice] Pretty amazing, right?
content.previousText: Oh sure, because AI voices are totally going to replace human actors. That'll never happen. Right?
content.nextText: Lenny will wrap up our test with final thoughts.

content.speaker: Lenny
content.text: [satisfied] That completes our v3 Alpha test. [thoughtful] If you're hearing this with all the emotional nuance... [excited] then the workflow is functioning perfectly!
content.previousText: Here's a secret about v3 Alpha it can actually understand context between sentences. Pretty amazing, right?
